configuration.name: accountId
configuration.title: Account ID
configuration.description: Account ID to be associated with the query

configuration.name: query
configuration.title: Query (do not use timeseries or facets)
configuration.description: NRQL query eg. SELECT count(*) FROM TransactionError

configuration.name: timelineBucket
configuration.title: Bucket size in minutes (default 1 minute)
configuration.description: This value is used for the since clause and for the timeseries query

configuration.name: thresholdDirection
configuration.title: Threshold Direction: above or below (default: above)
configuration.description: value must be above or below

configuration.name: criticalThreshold
configuration.title: Critical Threshold
configuration.description: If above this value critical will be rendered

configuration.name: criticalLabel
configuration.title: Optional: Critical Label
configuration.description: Optionally render this label if critical threshold exceeded

configuration.name: warningThreshold
configuration.title: Warning Threshold
configuration.description: If above this value warning will be rendered

configuration.name: warningLabel
configuration.title: Optional: Warning Label
configuration.description: Optionally render this label if warning threshold exceeded

configuration.name: healthyLabel
configuration.title: Optional: Healthy Label
configuration.description: Optionally render this label instead of the value when healthy

configuration.name: displayTimeline
configuration.title: Display Timeline Status
configuration.description: If defined a timeline will be rendered below with the configured bucket size

configuration.name: displayMetric
configuration.title: Display Metric
configuration.description: Display the metric

configuration.name: decimalPlaces
configuration.title: Decimal Places
configuration.description: Set decimal places on metric

configuration.name: metricLabel
configuration.title: Optional: Metric Label
configuration.description: Label to place under the metric

configuration.name: metricSuffix
configuration.title: Optional: Metric Suffix
configuration.description: Label to place beside the metric

configuration.name: onClickUrl
configuration.title: Optional: On Click URL
configuration.description: Add an on click url to navigate to another page such as a runbook

configuration.name: untilClause
configuration.title: Optional: UNTIL clause
configuration.description: Optionally add an UNTIL clause to assist in excluding data

configuration.name: subQueryLeft
configuration.title: Bottom Left Metric - Add an additional query to the bottom left of the widget

configuration.name: thresholdDirectionLeft
configuration.title: Bottom Left Metric - Threshold Direction: above or below (default: above)
configuration.description: value must be above or below

configuration.name: criticalThresholdLeft
configuration.title: Bottom Left Metric - Critical Threshold
configuration.description: If above this value critical will be rendered

configuration.name: criticalLabelLeft
configuration.title: Bottom Left Metric - Optional: Critical Label
configuration.description: Optionally render this label if critical threshold exceeded

configuration.name: warningThresholdLeft
configuration.title: Bottom Left Metric - Warning Threshold
configuration.description: If above this value warning will be rendered

configuration.name: warningLabelLeft
configuration.title: Bottom Left Metric - Optional: Warning Label
configuration.description: Optionally render this label if warning threshold exceeded

configuration.name: healthyLabelLeft
configuration.title: Bottom Left Metric - Optional: Healthy Label
configuration.description: Optionally render this label instead of the value when healthy

configuration.name: decimalPlacesLeft
configuration.title: Bottom Left Metric - Decimal Places
configuration.description: Set decimal places on metric

configuration.name: metricSuffixLeft
configuration.title: Bottom Left Metric - Optional: Metric Suffix
configuration.description: Label to place beside the metric
